data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roxo, Fabio F., Ochoa, Luz E., Silva, Gabriel S. C., Oliveira, Claudio (2015): Rhinolekoscapetinga: a new cascudinho species (Loricariidae, Otothyrinae) from the rio Tocantins basin and comments on its ancestral dispersal route. ZooKeys 481: 109-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.481.8755, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.481.8755
